techmeme.title: Paris-based Aqemia, which aims to scale drug discovery using quantum algorithms and AI, raised $38M led by Cathay Innovation, after raising €30M in January 2024 (Paul Sawers/TechCrunch)
The US Commerce Department finalizes $6.1B+ for memory chipmaker Micron to fund its New York and Idaho factory projects, one of the largest CHIPS Act subsidies (Deborah Sophia/Reuters)
Software testing service LambdaTest, which supports 5K+ browser and OS combinations, raised a $38M Series D led by Avataar, taking its total funding to $108M (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
TikTok launches TikTok Shop in Spain, letting creators sell products from beauty to home appliances, the first step of the feature's European rollout (Bloomberg)
TeamViewer says it plans to acquire 1E, which makes automated remediation software, from Carlyle for $720M, closing in early 2025, its biggest acquisition yet (Aaron Kirchfeld/Bloomberg)
